articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from third practice and qualifying at the Spanish Grand Prix.

articles.description: Marcus Smith boosts his chances of retaining England's number 10 jersey for their upcoming series with New Zealand after starring in a comfortable win over Japan.
articles.title: Japan 17-52 England: Marcus Smith stars in comfortable win in Tokyo

articles.description: Should the players take responsibility? Are England missing Jordan Henderson? Will Anthony Gordon play? The England inquest rolls on.

articles.description: Shai Hope hits a stunning unbeaten 82 as West Indies thrash fellow co-hosts USA to reignite their hopes of reaching the T20 World Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Shai Hope shines as West Indies thrash USA

articles.description: France fail to score without Kylian Mbappe in the starting XI but boss Didier Deschamps says he is "unconcerned" by his side's struggles.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: France struggle without striker but Didier Deschamps 'unconcerned'

articles.description: Nelly Korda misses the cut at the Women’s PGA Championship as Sarah Schmelzel and Amy Yang are joint leaders after the second round.
articles.title: Women's PGA Championship: Nelly Korda hits 81 in second round to miss cut

articles.description: Declan Rice says England have “put too much pressure on ourselves” after the 1-1 draw with Denmark in their second group game at Euro 2024.
articles.title: England have put too much pressure on ourselves - Declan Rice

articles.description: Netherlands boss Ronald Koeman insists Xavi Simons' disallowed goal should have stood in the 0-0 draw against France at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Netherlands disallowed goal: Should Xavi Simons' effort have counted?

articles.description: England have positives to take from defeat by South Africa, if they improve they can still be contenders at the T20 World Cup.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: 'England's defeat by South Africa not a time for panic, they can be contenders'

articles.description: BBC Sport Scotland pundits Leanne Crichton and Steven Thompson consider how Scotland might compensate for the loss of Kieran Tierney against Hungary.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Who replaces Kieran Tierney for Scotland?
